title: 3 Bed / 1 Bath Bristol St. Kendall for 9/1 - VIDEO TOUR IN DESCRIPTION
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 162303064', 'Rent: $3,600 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: street parking', '- Excellent deal and great location!', 'Close to MIT and everything you need.', '- 3 Bedroom / 1 Bath Apartment on Bristol St. in Kendall Square/East Cambridge.', '- Features hard wood floors, sunny spacious rooms, modern bathroom, modern kitchen with gas range and breakfast bar.', 'Gas Heat-', 'One off-street parking spot available for $200 per month', 'FEATURES', 'Coin-op Laundry', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Freshly Painted', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Pet Friendly', 'Professionally managed Building', 'Refrigerator', 'Renovated', 'Email Danielle Dimond with your names and email addresses if you will be attending the showing at 5:45 on Thursday, July 21.', 'Applications can be directed to your party via email for completion.', 'If you don’t want to apply for this unit but want help finding something else, I’d be more than happy to assist you.', 'I’m able to show any units that are listed on the MLS and am very quick to communicate with the other brokers and agents.', 'VIDEO TOUR:  https://youtu.be/ya9lO6hGwV0', 'Pictures used in our marketing may occasionally be of model units.', 'Apartment availability, features and amenities subject to variation and change.', 'Contact posting agent for the most current and accurate information available.', '- Senné']
